sentences.sContent: All through the hot, still days of their holiday Amy basked in the sun.
sentences.sCn: 在整个炎热、寂静的假期里埃米都在晒太阳。

synos.tran: 晒太阳；取暖；愉快或舒适

remMethod.val: 她要 (ask) 我和她一起去晒太阳 (bask)

trans.tranCn: 晒太阳；取暖；愉快或舒适
trans.tranOther: to enjoy sitting or lying in the heat of the sun or a fire
